vision.title: Our Vision
vision.statement: To be a thriving community of believers that gathers to worship, grows in faith, and goes forth to transform Windsor and beyond with the love of Christ.
details: Building authentic relationships with God and each other
Creating a welcoming environment for all people
Serving our community with excellence and compassion

sections.title: GATHER
sections.description: We gather as the body of Christ to worship, fellowship, and celebrate God's goodness together.

sections.title: GROW
sections.description: We grow in our relationship with God through discipleship, biblical teaching, and spiritual development.

sections.title: GO
sections.description: We go into our community and the world to share the Gospel and serve others in Christ's name.

values.title: Biblical Foundation
values.description: We believe in the authority and inerrancy of Scripture as our guide for faith and practice.

values.title: Authentic Community
values.description: We foster genuine relationships built on love, acceptance, and mutual support.

values.title: Excellence in Worship
values.description: We pursue excellence in all aspects of worship, ministry, and service.

values.title: Passionate Outreach
values.description: We are committed to reaching our community and the world with God's love.
